bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Command-line argument `-carla-settings` fails to load absolute paths
bug.description: Relative paths seem to work fine, but it fails to load absolute paths, not even showing the "Unable to find settings file" error. The code in question is in at "CarlaSettings.cpp". It seems relatively straightforward to fix with Unreal's <denchmark-link:https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/API/Runtime/Core/Misc/FPaths/>FPath</denchmark-link> utils.
